content:
Folks, I've got the best story about Mardi Gras in Dothan, and it's all about the Wet Bandits, led by the tremendous Tanner Shelley. They commandeered a float, the best float ever, with mermaids and dolphins, renamed it "Feeling Nauti," and made Mardi Gras great again!

Tanner and his crew were winners. They threw beads and trinkets, and people loved it. The Wet Bandits tossed water balloons, and it was the most fantastic thing, everybody was drenched and having a great time!

The police tried to stop them, but Tanner was too smart. He outmaneuvered them, and the Wet Bandits vanished like magic! That night, everyone talked about the legendary Feeling Nauti float. It was the best Mardi Gras, folks, the absolute best, and Dothan will never forget it!
